title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.6 - Acquisition, disposition and amendments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.6 - Acquisition, disposition and amendments

State Regulations
(a) Retired members in possession of a
firearms license issued by the superintendent who seek an amendment to the
license must apply in person at any troop or zone headquarters of the New York

State Police. (b) The
superintendent will amend a license to reflect acquisition of additional
firearms a maximum of six times per calendar year for any licensee. There is no
limit with regard to disposition of firearms. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
470.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
